name: Michele Evink
text: They are doing a great job not just making pizzas, but following health guidelines to keep people safe. I tried the high rise crust this time. I'm going back to regular, but still enjoyed the food. Their lemonade is the best!!!

text: It is a unique pizza store. They have fresh dough so you can pick your toppings and they will make it for you right away. You can change the ingredients or you could pick from their selected pizzas. Your pizza gets ready in less than 5 minutes. Its a cozy place with very nice decoration.

name: Carol Holland
text: The pizza was delicious and the staff was friendly and helpful. I am new to thier app and the person cashing us out helped me use it appropriately. Since I wasn't a new customer,  but new to the app she graciously gave me a BOGO coupon to ‚Ä¶More

name: Dani Jones
text: I just want to say, your pizza, your employees, and your service was exceptional. My family of 5 does a "family night" every Saturday night. We have pizza wherever we can find it which is usually in Indianola where we live. We were in West ‚Ä¶More

name: Spencer Hoyt
text: Really great place I would definitely recommend. Personal pizzas at a decent price with the option for half pizza with salad. The line to order can take a bit of time. Oven pizza that comes out in 10min. Get the signature and you can add as much toppings as you want..

name: Thai B
text: Stopped in for a quick bite. Good selection of ingredients and everything looked fresh. Service was pretty fast even though I must have thrown the cashier off by paying with cash, as it took her a while to figure out my change. ‚Ä¶More

name: Joshua Verwers
text: With a family of 6 having different tastes and myself being on the ketogenic diet, the menu at Blaze is perfect for us. The food is fresh and fast and I have not had a bad customer service experience. The staff is friendly, helpful and patient. We love to eat at Blaze.

name: Adrian Mitchell
text: The staff have always been friendly here and they are quick to make my order. They are great with deals and the owner works shifts here. That shows a dedication to make a quality product. Very efficient and tasty. Not a bad price and the location allows for a diversity of food options.

name: Claire Campbell
text: Super fast ordering and baking times.  Superfan of all the options, both gluten-free and vegan.  Wasn't a huge fan of the vegan cheese option, but I'm just super picky with those.  Pizza tastes excellent, ingredients appeared super fresh.  Will come again. üòÅ

name: Samuel Bigger
text: Our first time here and it was great! I like the fact that they will add anything to your pizza, especially when you want more of something. Fast service, great staff, quality ingredients and low cost!! We will definitely be back!

Perfect size for my boyfriend and I to share! Im actually back again today! Same hospitality, quickness, and great food! Youve made a customer for life!
